mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOMETAXBBS (HOMETAXBBS_SEQ, MYID, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, DEL, DEPTH, REF, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME) VALUES(HOMETAXBBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{myid}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0, HOMETAXBBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{filename}, #{newfilename})
mapper.select:
SELECT RNUM, HOMETAXBBS_SEQ, MYID, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, DEL, DEPTH, REF, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, DOWNCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY HOMETAXBBS_SEQ) AS RNUM, MYID, HOMETAXBBS_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, DEL, DEPTH, REF, FILENAME, NEWFILENAME, DOWNCOUNT FROM HOMETAXBBS WHERE 1=1
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND MYID LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
